verses.roman:
sanātana bhāgi' pāche karena gamana
balātkāre dhari, prabhu kailā āliṅgana

synonyms: sanātana—Sanātana Gosvāmī; bhāgi'-running away; pāche—back; karena gamana—goes; balātkāre—by force; dhari—capturing; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kailā āliṅgana—embraced.
translation: Sanātana Gosvāmī backed away, but Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu caught him by force and embraced him.
